title: MultiSorterFixedCollection
description: This document describes the metadata properties available when mapping a fixed collection to MultiSorter control. Typically the controls that make use of this definition display some sort of list to the user.

DisplayValue.description: The value to display to the user. If not specified, the ReturnValue will be used.

ReturnValue.description: The value to return on selection.

AscendingLabel.description: The value to display ascending label. If not specified, default value is `Ascending`.

DescendingLabel.description: The value to display descending label label. If not specified, default value is `Descending`.
